block.l: board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); } if (text.length > 60) { throw new Error("Please enter text less than 60 characters in length") }
var array = [0xF0, 0x09]; for (i = 0; i < text.length; i++) { array.push(text.charCodeAt(i)) } array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array))

this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x0B, speed, state, 0xF7]))

input.options: smile neutral frown question ok tick cross rock paper sissors blank

block.l: board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }

if (image == "smile") choice = 0x00 if (image == "neutral") choice = 0x01 if (image == "frown") choice = 0x02 if (image == "question") choice = 0x03 if (image == "ok") choice = 0x04 if (image == "tick") choice = 0x05 if (image == "cross") choice = 0x06 if (image == "rock") choice = 0x07 if (image == "paper") choice = 0x08 if (image == "sissors") choice = 0x09 if (image == "blank") choice = 0x0A this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x0A, 0x01, choice, 0xF7]))

board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); } if (text.length > 60) { throw new Error("Please enter text less than 60 characters in length") }
var array = [0xF0, 0x0A, 0x02]; for (i = 0; i < text.length; i++) { array.push(text.charCodeAt(i)) } array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array))

board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }
var units = 0 var tens = 0 if (number >= 0 && number <= 99){ tens = parseInt(number/10) units = number - (tens*10) this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x0A, 0x03, tens, units, 0xF7])) }
throw new Error("Please enter a number between 0 and 99");

board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }
this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x0A, 0x06, 0xF7]))

board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }
var array = [0xF0, 0x0A, 0x04]; for (i = 0; i < hex.length; i += 2) { array.push(parseInt(hex.substr(i, 2), 16)) } array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array))

block-definition.s: $robot set LED display pixel R: %'row' C: %'column' %'state'

block.l: board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }
this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x0A, 0x05, row, column, state, 0xF7]))
throw new Error("Please enter a row and column values between 0 and 7");

var myself = this; this.arduino.ultrasoundValue = null; this.arduino.board.once('string', function(data){ myself.arduino.ultrasoundValue = parseFloat(data) }); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x08, 0xF7]));
return (this.arduino.ultrasoundValue != null)
return this.arduino.ultrasoundValue

board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }
Please input a sensor number between 1 and 5

board = this.arduino.board; //Definition should change according to the context if (board.pins[3].supportedModes.indexOf(0x05) === -1) { throw new Error("Please upload cre_firmata_1.ino to your Arduino"); }

var myself = this; var position = 0, online = 0, readline = 0; var linesensor = [L1, L2, L3, L4, L5]; var centre; if (sensors == 3) centre = 2; if (sensors == 5) centre = 3; for (i = 0; i < sensors; i++) { if (linesensor[i] == 0) { online = online + 1; position = position + (i+1); } } switch (online){ case 0: this.arduino.readline = sensors + 1; break; case sensors: this.arduino.readline = sensors; break; default: this.arduino.readline = (position / online) - centre; }
return this.arduino.readline
number of line sensors should be 3 or 5
